questions.question: What library builds user interfaces with components?
questions.explanation: React is a component-based UI library.

questions.question: Which framework follows the MVC pattern?
What framework offers progressive adoption?
questions.explanation: Vue can be adopted incrementally in projects.

questions.question: What React feature manages application state?
questions.explanation: Hooks like useState manage state in React.

questions.question: Which syntax embeds HTML in JavaScript?
questions.explanation: JSX allows HTML-like syntax in JavaScript.

questions.question: What Angular feature enables two-way binding?
questions.explanation: ngModel creates two-way data binding in Angular.

questions.question: What Vue feature manages reactive data?
questions.explanation: The data function defines reactive state in Vue.

questions.question: What tool bundles JavaScript modules?
questions.explanation: Webpack bundles and optimizes JavaScript modules.

questions.question: Which framework compiles components at build time?
questions.explanation: Svelte compiles components to optimized JavaScript.

questions.question: What React feature enables code reuse?
questions.explanation: Components are reusable building blocks in React.
